parser

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • parser.XMLParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class XMLParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    This class calls the SAX parser to process the input XML file and parse the information into objects of their respective appropriate types.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • loadSlideshow

        public SlideshowData loadSlideshow(java.lang.String inputFile)
        This method gets the parser and then starts the parser reading through the XML file. As the parser reads through the XML file, it will call the appropriate methods within this class as it encounters new elements, end elements, characters in the main content of and element, etc. This method is public so that a controlling class can build an instance of this class and then call this method to read the XML file and return the data.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The file path of the input XML
        Returns:
        SlideshowData object
